post.title: YKU Curriculum
post.body:
outline of the YKU Curriculum - 

- new internet technologies such as zeronet;
- natural science including physics, math, chemistry, biology
- English literature
- world history
- futurology
- new social studies
- customized study refexing our donor's needs and interests

post.title: Who should join?
Yukon University
post.body:
there is not such a physical university. 
but, it would be so fantastic if we create one online. 
anyone interested? 

for 1 Namecoin, i will develop this site into a virtual university with its unique curriculum outlined later.
